Independent Cascade module¶

The Independent Cascade Model class¶

class src.independent_cascade.IndependentCascadeModel(g, seeds, act_prob)[source]¶

Bases: object

Independent Cascade model class

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which IC is performed.

  • seeds (List[str]) – list of seed nodes

  • act_prob (float) – probability of a node being influenced.

cascade(g, seeds, act_prob)[source]¶

Executes the IC diffusion process.

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which IC is performed.

  • seeds (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

  • act_prob (float) – activation probability

Returns

List of lists of influenced nodes as well as the total number of influenced nodes.

Return type

Tuple[List[List[str]], int]

diffuse_all(g: src.graph.Graph, seed_nodes: List[str], act_prob: float) → Tuple[List[List[str]], int][source]¶

Executes the diffusion process until no more nodes can be influenced.

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which IC is performed.

  • seed_nodes (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

  • act_prob (float) – activation probability

Returns

List of lists of influenced nodes as well as the total number of influenced nodes.

Return type

Tuple[List[List[str]], int]

diffuse_one_round(g: src.graph.Graph, seed_nodes: List[str], tried_edges: List[str], act_prob: float) → Tuple[List[str], List[str], Set[Tuple[str, str]]][source]¶

Executes the diffusion process for one round.

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which IC is performed.

  • seed_nodes (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

  • tried_edges (List[str]) – list of edges that have been visited so far.

  • act_prob (float) – activation probability

Returns

The list of the new seed nodes, the list of the nodes that got influenced at the given round and the list of edges that got visited at the given round .

Return type

Tuple[List[str],List[str],Set[Tuple[str,str]]]

get_influenced_nodes() → List[List[str]][source]¶

Returns a list of all the influenced nodes after carrying out the diffusion process.

Returns

list of influenced nodes.

Return type

List[List[str]]

get_total_number_of_influenced_nodes() → int[source]¶

Returns the total number of influenced nodes after carrying out the diffusion process.

Returns

number of influenced nodes

Return type

int

static prop_success(act_prob: float) → bool[source]¶

Generates a random number and returns whether it is below act_prob.

Parameters

act_prob (float) – probability of a node being influenced.

Returns

whether the generated random number is below act_prob.

Return type

bool
